content.p: How does the body exchange with the environment? Indicate whether the functions below help the body exchange with the environment.

response.feedback: Correct. Breathing allows us to bring in oxygen and expel waste (carbon dioxide).
Incorrect. While you cannot see an exchange taking place, breathing allows us to bring in oxygen and expel waste (carbon dioxide).

part.hint: Exchange with the environment involves everything that goes in and out of the body.

response.feedback: Correct. Exchanging with the environment includes getting rid of waste. Build-up of toxins or undigested material can cause physiological problems.
